content: this text is about a legal case that took place in tartu county court the case involved a plaintiff and a defendant who were previously married and bought an apartment together during their marriage the plaintiff has been living in the apartment with their children since the marriage ended in 2017 and has been paying all the expenses for the apartment on their own the defendant has expressed interest in dividing the property in the future the plaintiff is requesting that the apartment be considered their sole property and that they be compensated for the expenses they have incurred the court has received statements from both parties and has determined that the case can proceed the court will evaluate the evidence and make a decision based on the applicable laws the court will also decide on the distribution of the procedural costs it is established that the parties were married and acquired the apartment during their marriage the court will divide the joint property and may give the apartment to the plaintiff while obliging the defendant to pay their share of the money the plaintiff claims that the value of the apartment is 53000 euros but the defendant disputes this value the plaintiff has submitted evidence of the loan balance and the loan agreement the court is considering the dispute regarding the value of the apartment the plaintiff has incurred expenses amounting to 1586877 euros the court notes that according to the civil code joint property and obligations must be taken into account when dividing the property the court has determined that the procedural costs of the case will be distributed between the parties

metadata.marital_regime: issues relatively division of common properties
